participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, loves to engage in fun activities and enjoys being around family and pets.
participant_1.background: I love to sing karaoke and get my heart rate up with archery. I have four daughters. I love spending time with my dog, she's my best friend! I dress to impress, even when my heart is broken. My father works in advertising agency.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for music and a hopeful outlook on life.
participant_2.background: I don't care what color my hair is as long as I can keep acting. I am saving up to buy a new camera. I've learned to live without my dad. I play music in my spare time. I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Not much, just playing some music in my room. What about you?
I'm just getting ready to go for a walk with my dog. She's my best friend! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar, bass, and piano. I like to sing too.
Wow, that's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument. Do you play in any bands?
I used to, but I don't have time anymore. I'm working on saving up to buy a new camera.
That's cool. I'm not really into photography, but I know it's a lot of fun.
It is! I'm hoping to start my own photography business one day.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be successful.
Thanks! I'm trying to stay positive.
Good for you! It's important to stay positive, especially when you're working towards a goal.
Yeah, I know. Thanks for chatting with me!
No problem! It was nice talking to you too.
